name: Jefflr
tagline: Some **super serious** tools for the complete [#jefflr](http://mixlr.com/jeff-gerstmann/chat) experience.
body:
# Projects

Here's what's inside:

+[Bookmarklet](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/bookmarklet)
+[IRCbot for 2-way Mixlr chat](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/mixirc)
+[Stream Ripper](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/pymixlr)
+[Chrome Extension](https://github.com/therealtakeshi/jefflr/tree/master/extension-chrome)

___

## License

If it even matters, all code in this project is released under the MIT license, so take it and go crazy. Good luck to you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
